list.name: Changes
list.comment: - minor fix to the conda env - sync before testing on separate machines.

task.summary: - add initial code and .idea project files

- created lookup.py, which has chains for evaluating and acting on GOOGLE requests. It comes with agents ready to interact with the google api. - engineered prompts for every available role: user_in, google_in, google_out - expanded output system to use user-friendly colors, and stream the responses.

- google search chat chain is fully functional, all search results are split up, converted into embeddings and uploaded into the vector database. - vector search results are now stored permanently. - simplified main chat chain to always perform a google search - other project related files were added / modified

- extended the final summarization step to take in as many articles as our model is capable of handling. - improved search function by further isolating search prompt provided by the llm. - other minor changes.

Urgent fix and improvement. - The vector database is now automatically created without human interaction. - switched the default model to a much better zephyr model (5GB), which produces embeddings around 3x faster than the previous model.
- add conda config - add gitignore - remove user interaction loop (context problems) - add README with install instructions.
- minor fix to the conda env - sync before testing on separate machines.

MESSAGE.value: - add initial code and .idea project files

- created lookup.py, which has chains for evaluating and acting on GOOGLE requests. It comes with agents ready to interact with the google api. - engineered prompts for every available role: user_in, google_in, google_out - expanded output system to use user-friendly colors, and stream the responses.

- google search chat chain is fully functional, all search results are split up, converted into embeddings and uploaded into the vector database. - vector search results are now stored permanently. - simplified main chat chain to always perform a google search - other project related files were added / modified

- extended the final summarization step to take in as many articles as our model is capable of handling. - improved search function by further isolating search prompt provided by the llm. - other minor changes.

Urgent fix and improvement. - The vector database is now automatically created without human interaction. - switched the default model to a much better zephyr model (5GB), which produces embeddings around 3x faster than the previous model.
- add conda config - add gitignore - remove user interaction loop (context problems) - add README with install instructions.
- minor fix to the conda env - sync before testing on separate machines.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: - minor fix to the conda env - sync before testing on separate machines.
